with precision.

Windows, macOS, Linux
Chromium Based

TRUSTED BY 10,000 TEAMS IN AUTOMATION & SECURITY

Your Digital Fingerprint is Being Tracked

Standard browsers leak hundreds of data points. Websites compile these into a unique ID to link your accounts, detect automation, or ban your access.

Invisible Tracking

Even in Incognito mode, your hardware configuration exposes your identity.

Account Linking

Platforms correlate accounts based on matching Canvas, WebGL, and Font hashes.

Proxy Leaks

Poor configuration leads to WebRTC leaks, revealing your true IP address.

Bot Detection

Anti-fraud systems flag mismatched browser parameters immediately.

SYSTEM LEVEL PROTECTION

Native Fingerprint Isolation

Unlike plugins that just block scripts (and get detected), PrintGuard modifies the browser core. Every profile you create acts as a completely distinct physical device.

  • Canvas & WebGL Noise Injection
  • AudioContext & ClientRects Protection
  • Geo-location & Timezone Auto-match
  • WebRTC IP Handling Policy

99.9%

Uptime SLA

10M+

Profiles Secured

Engineered for Scale

Everything you need to manage thousands of accounts securely.

Advanced Fingerprinting

4,0

Customize every parameter: UserAgent, Screen Resolution, WebGL Vendor, and installed Fonts.

Proxy Management

4,9

Import thousands of proxies. Auto-check connection health. Support for HTTP, SOCKS4, SOCKS5.

Automation API

5,0

Headless support for Puppeteer, Selenium, and Playwright. Run scripts at scale locally or cloud.

Team Collaboration

4,7

Share profiles with team members without sharing passwords. Permissions and transfer history.

Cookie Robot

4,9

Warm up profiles automatically. The robot visits sites to collect cookies before you use the account.

Cloud Synchronization

4,5

Access your environments from any device. Encrypted cloud storage for session data.

Command Center for your Operations

Manage unlimited profiles with a clean, intuitive interface.

Get Started in Seconds

01

Create Profile

Choose OS, browser version, and device type.

02

Config Proxy

Paste your proxy credentials or use our built-in provider.

03

Generate FP

One-click generation of a unique, valid digital fingerprint.

04

Launch

Browser opens in a secure, isolated container sandbox.

Built For Your Needs

Multi-Account Management

Manage hundreds of social media, e-commerce, or advertising accounts without getting banned or linked.

  • Affiliate Marketing
  • Social Media Agencies

Web Scraping & Automation

Scrape data from complex websites that employ heavy anti-bot protection. Scale your data collection operations.

  • Price Monitoring
  • Ad Verification

Start Securing Your Sessions Today

Join thousands of businesses that trust BrowserShield for their multi-accounting and automation needs.

Browser Fingerprint is an anti-detect browser designed to securely manage multiple accounts by creating isolated browser profiles with protected fingerprints, optimized for digital marketing, advertising, e-commerce, and automation.
